How to use

Everything written in this book picks up from where previous chapters left off.

Visit the GitHub page if you are viewing this from GitHub.

While any chapter can be read as a separate topic, it would be best if you would start from the beginning.

The Datalabs Guidebook uses modules created from the Dataplay Handbook, where you can find tutorials and documentation on these modules.
